articles.author: Mark Doyle
articles.title: The second coming of Cristiano Ronaldo: Forget the tactical concerns - Kylian Mbappe was born to play for Real Madrid - Goal.com
articles.description: Kylian Mbappe isn't a player that Real Madrid necessarily need to sign, but the France forward was undeniably born to play at Santiago Bernabeu
articles.content: Los Blancos don't need another world-class left-sided forward, but the France captain was always going to end up at Santiago BernabeuReal Madrid had been waiting for Kylian Mbappe for two years. Tic … [+830 chars]

articles.author: Henry Valantine
articles.title: The big 'surprise' that awaits Lewis Hamilton after historic Ferrari move - Planet F1
articles.description: The power of the Tifosi is even stronger than even Lewis Hamilton could expect, according to one former Ferrari favourite.
articles.content:
Former Ferrari race engineer Rob Smedley believes the power of the Tifosi will “absolutely take Lewis Hamilton by surprise” in 2025, such is their passion for their team.

articles.title: Arsenal win crucial match against Liverpool, back in title race | The 2 Robbies Podcast | NBC Sports - NBC Sports
articles.description: Robbie Earle and Robbie Mustoe share their main takeaways from Arsenal's 3-1 victory over Liverpool in Matchweek 23 to get back into the Premier League title...
